title: Toys and games market : market segmentation by value 2009
summary: This bar chart has 7 columns on the x axis representing Name, and Market share in each Name on the y axis.
Name Other has the highest Market share and Plush toys has the lowest Market share.
The difference of Market share between the highest and lowest Name is 25.4.
min_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Market share for 7 number of Names.
Name Other has the highest Market share and Plush toys has the lowest Market share.
mid_summary: This bar chart has 7 columns on the x axis representing Name, and Market share in each Name on the y axis.
Name Other has the highest Market share and Plush toys has the lowest Market share.
The difference of Market share between the highest and lowest Name is 25.4.
max_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Market share for 7 number of Names.
The Market share is appeared to be the highest at Name Other and lowest at Name Plush toys.
Name Infant/Pre-school toys has the second highest value for Market share.
The minimum Name Plush toys has got 5.98 times less Market share than the maximum Name Other.
Name Other is higher than any other Names with value 30.5, followed by Infant/Pre-school toys, and Activity toys. Down to Name Plush toys with the lowest value 5.1.
The Name Other tends to be 2.13 percent higher than average.
Summing up the values of all Names, we get total 100.0.
